message_1: Let f(z) = z^3 - 3z^2 + 4z - 2 be a complex function. Determine if f(z) is analytic at z = 1-2i.
message_2: A function is analytic at a point if it is differentiable at that point and in a neighborhood around that point. Since f(z) is a polynomial function, it is differentiable everywhere in the complex plane, including at z = 1 - 2i. Therefore, f(z) is analytic at z = 1 - 2i.
